description: Example configuration file for customizing module order
instructions: Copy this file to module-order.json and modify the order arrays to customize the display order of skincare and makeup modules

notes.customization: You can reorder these arrays to change the display order. The system will match module names from the API to these configured names.
notes.fallback: If this file doesn't exist or is invalid, the system will use the default order from the API.
notes.matching: Module names are matched case-insensitively and with flexible string matching to handle variations.
